name: 3D 4x4 Off-Road Truck Racing - Extreme Trials Driving Simulator FREE
name_original: 3D 4x4 Off-Road Truck Racing - Extreme Trials Driving Simulator FREE
description:
Get ready for Extreme driving in this amazing 4x4 truck simulator. Race as fast as you can down a windy mountain road. Real trucks, real dirt action! Do you have what it takes to be a champion?

Features:
-Realistic 3D graphics
-3 Off-Road Trucks to choose from
-Endless truck racing action
